name: Grave Run
description:
This was part of a midterm project I made in school. Just to show that I could build and program certain mechanics. You can break boxes and other objects. Jump, Walk, Run. 

Destroying objects are part of solving the puzzles in the game. Includes checkpoints and sound.  

Controls:

Arrows or WASD to move

Shift to run

Space or Click to attack

ESC to go back to tile menu

Had fun making it. It's just 3 levels, not at all polished but it is playable.
